title: Dishwashing by hand
creator_credit: Dale W. Imus, Donald F. Grant and Los Angeles City Health Department
brief_description: A film which emphasises the importance of hygienic dish-washing, showing that for health and attractive presentation in either large or small cafeterias, dishes must be scraped, pre-rinsed, washed, rinsed and drained. Both mechanical and hand methods are illustrated.
creator_credit_for_label: Dale W. Imus, Donald F. Grant and Los Angeles City Health Department
